item.title: 2026 NFL Offseason Buzz, Rumors: Chiefs Star Travis Kelce Coming Back?
item.description: The NFL offseason hasn't officially arrived yet, but 30 teams are already looking ahead to 2026. Here's the latest offseason buzz and rumors around th...

item.title: Tom Brady to Patriots Owner Robert Kraft: 'Get That 7th Ring So We Can Match'
item.description: Tom Brady made it abundantly clear who he's pulling for in Super Bowl LX between the Seattle Seahawks and New England Patriots.

item.title: Rick Pitino to St. John's Star Zuby Ejiofor: 'You're Going to Make Me Retire'
item.description: Rick Pitino was all smiles with his star big man, Zuby Ejiofor, after No. 22 St. John's upset No. 3 UConn on Friday night.

item.title: Former Los Angeles Dodgers Star Yasiel Puig Faces 20 Years in Federal Prison
item.description: Former Los Angeles Dodgers star Yasiel Puig was found guilty of obstruction and faces 20 years in federal prison.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From St. John's Upset Win Over UConn
item.description: St. John’s completed an upset of No. 3 UConn, 81-72, to snap the Huskies’ 18-game winning streak and reopen the Big East race.
